data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Villalobos, José Luis, García, Anelli J., Velázquez, Ernesto (2010): A new species of freshwater crab of the genus Odontothelphusa Rodríguez, 1982, (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pseudothelphusidae) from Chiapas, Mexico. Zootaxa 2414: 52-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.293269
